description:
Stop more threats by keeping up to date on publicly disclosed vulnerabilities discovered by HP DVLabs and the HP Zero Day Initiative. This app helps keep you informed of the latest published advisories.
HP TippingPoint leads the industry in vulnerability discovery with HP DVLabs and HP Zero Day Initiative. HP DVLabs is a premier information security research organization for vulnerability analysis and discovery. The team consists of industry recognized security researchers that apply their cutting-edge engineering, reverse engineering and analysis talents in our daily operations. The by-product of these efforts fuels the creation of vulnerability filters that are automatically delivered to our customers' intrusion prevention systems through the Digital Vaccine® service.
